I

img - Variable in class Tile
The representation of the Tile
index - Variable in class Animation
current Index of the Animation
Input - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the class where the possible input in the game is recorded/dealt with.When the Level is first loaded, the game is in pause mode until you press any of the movement key.
Input() - Constructor for class Input
 
isActive - Variable in class Monster
 
isDone - Variable in class Death
Whether the Death animation has finished playing
isDrowning - Variable in class Monster
 
isMoving - Variable in class Character
Determines whether the Character is currently moving
isMovingAcrossScreen - Variable in class Tile
Monster shot twice within few second flies across the screen.
isOnBoat - Static variable in class Character
Determines whether the Character is currently surfing on a Monster
isPushing - Variable in class Character
Determines whether the Character is currently pushing something
isShooting - Static variable in class Character
Determines whether the Character is currently shooting
isSleeping - Variable in class Leeper
Whether this Monster is currently is Sleep Mode
isSolid - Variable in class Tile
determine whether tile is solid/can be passed through
